title: Instructions Task MGMT
description: This is a task management app. You can add as many as task you want with subtasks. There are 3 types of tasks: Todo, Doing and Done. By clicking on the task card you will be able to visualize the task information. The 3 dots open a menu for editing or deleting the task.

subtasks.description: Type the subtask and hit the add new subtask button.
You can delete the subtask by clicking the "X" next it.
You can change the task status.
You can delete this task by clicking on the delete option.
You can scroll horizontally to see the tasks ony for mobile screen size.
To close a window you only have to click outside.
To update a substask you have to type in the new content and hit enter
